title: Founder & Lead Developer
highlight: Production-ready iOS app with real-time content delivery
details: Built a production-ready iOS application using SwiftUI + UIKit with real-time content delivery, media handling, async caching, and push notifications.
Architected scalable backend infrastructure using Firebase Auth, Firestore, Realtime Database, Cloud Storage, and Azure services.
Set up CI/CD pipelines for automated builds, UI tests, and multi-environment deployments across iOS and web.

title: Full-Stack Developer
details: Built an Expo-based cross-platform app consolidating weather, baggage limits, and airport delay data.
Integrated OpenWeatherMap API and geolocation for real-time local forecasts.
Developed Python Flask backend with caching, rate-limiting, and secure API key management.

title: Full-Stack Developer
details: Integrated Google Maps API to visualize shuttle routes and live vehicle positions.
Built PHP/MySQL backend services to manage schedules and track vehicles.
Optimized location updates with AJAX polling every 5 seconds.

title: Full-Stack Developer
details: Built a trip tracking application for managing and organizing travel information.
Developed with modern web technologies for responsive user experience.
Implemented features for tracking trip details and itineraries.

title: Full-Stack Developer
highlight: MERN stack app for secure workout tracking
details: Developed a full-stack MERN application for secure workout logging and authentication.
Implemented password hashing and JSON Web Tokens for secure login.
Added CSV export functionality for workout history analysis.
